name: Debouncer

aliases.name: BounceDetails
aliases.comment: Pass these details to the bounce function to start / bounce the debouncer

types.name: SelfMsg
types.comment: Forward SelfMsgs to the process function

values.name: bounce
values.comment: Call bounce to start the debouncer as well as anytime the desired outccome changes.
values.type: Debouncer.BounceDetails appMsg -> Debouncer.DebouncerState -> ( Debouncer.DebouncerState , Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Debouncer.SelfMsg appMsg) )

values.name: create
values.comment: Create tagged debouncers with a given delay time (shared accross all of them)

values.name: process
values.comment: Forward the debouncer's `SelfMsg`s to this function so that debouncer can manage its state and fire the delayed commands when it is neccessary
values.type: Debouncer.SelfMsg appMsg -> Debouncer.DebouncerState -> ( Debouncer.DebouncerState, Platform.Cmd.Cmd appMsg )
